snippet: There's essentially one number that all of American baseball is buzzing about - and all of Japan, for that matter. That number is 97, as in miles per hour, the speed of the high-end fastballs thrown by the Japanese pitcher Yu Darvish. As pitches go,...
abstract: There's essentially one number that all of American baseball is buzzing about - and all of Japan, for that matter. That number is 97, as in miles per hour, the speed of the high-end fastballs thrown by the Japanese pitcher Yu Darvish. As pitches go, that's about as fast as it gets, and Mr. Darvish, the son of an Iranian father and a Japanese mother, is set to make his first major league start on Monday.

headline.main: Showtime: A Japanese Star Is Ready for His Close-up
